about_the_game:
Embark on a Journey to build a beer empire from the ground up. Slap on your brewer's shoes, rise from a small-time beer enthusiast to a legendary brew master and watch your business flourish as you master the craft. Concoct the most delectable brews and level up your knowledge to unlock an abundance of recipes and skills along the way.



Step into a large open world, from a rolling countryside to bustling towns where you can choose the perfect spot to expand you business, with each place offering unique advantages.

Start in your small abode, and when its time to expand, look for the next best place. Whether its close to the store for your produce, or a large warehouse to fit your needs.



Begin as a humble homebrewer and perfect your brewing skills. As you continue to brew, your knowledge will level up.

Levelling up your knowledge will unlock new recipes and let you learn new skills that will push your business to the next step.



Experience a live marketplace where the price of your brews can fluctuate based on supply and demand. Other players in the wider world of Brewing Haus can affect the prices of the beer you sell. Flooding the market with one particular beer will make its value drop over time.

So keep a sharp eye on the ever changing prices and try to predict the market to ensure the beer you make is a hot commodity.
